attributes.action: demand that threats to christianity, our country and our armed forces, be seen as encititng terrorism and be dealt with as such, including deportation
attributes.additional_details: To stop direct threats to our soldiers and our country in public demonstrations.  To take threats to christianity, our country and our armed forces as encitement of terrorism and be punished as so, by deportation, or lengthy prison sentences! To be able to stop demonstrations against us honouring our armed services and those who have died in battle - they fought for our country and for us - noone now living in this contry should be able to say things like burn in hell and burn poppies, which are a symbol of respect for our armed services who work to protect us and our country!
